name: Truston
overview:
Truston sells white-label identity theft protection services.

Truston helps direct marketers increase revenue and boost loyalty with white label membership programs offering identity theft and credit products. The company offers a complete set of private-label hosted web services for membership service providers, direct marketers, and financial institutions. There are over 250 banks, credit unions and direct marketers using our technology today.

Our technology is in use at American Express, HSBC, Fifth Third Bank, Bank of Hawaii, Identity Force (#1 provider of ID protection to U.S. government), and Affinion Group (world’s largest provider of membership products with over 70 million members worldwide). Learn more about our direct marketing partner program.

Our product received 4 out of 5 stars from PC Magazine and the 2008 Tomorrow’s Technology Today award from the Info Security Products Guide. Our innovative Software-as-a-Service platform won a 2008 Product Innovation Award. Truston was named a 2008 Hot Company winner by Silicon Valley Communications, the Pacific Coast Business Times named Truston one of the 10 Companies to Watch, and our CEO won a 2008 Shaping Info Security Award. Truston is a privately-held, closely-held company headquartered in Santa Barbara, California.
